body_html:
Same problem here with a small CNN, although using Keras with tensorflow. Batches larger than 65535 only seem to return correct results when using CPU. System info: Ubuntu 16.04, GTX 1080ti, tensorflow 1.3.0 and CUDA Version 8.0.61

Also the following issue seems related:
#13869

body:
Same problem here with a small CNN, although using Keras with tensorflow. Batches larger than 65535 only seem to return correct results when using CPU. System info: Ubuntu 16.04, GTX 1080ti, tensorflow 1.3.0 and CUDA Version 8.0.61
  
Also the following issue seems related:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/13869
